data.title: What is Martina Navratilovas Net Worth: Biography,Net Worth & more
data.meta_description: Navratilova is widely regarded as one of the greatest female tennis players of all time. Martina Navratilova is worth $25 million. She has 18 Grand Slam singles titles, 31 major womens doubles trophies, and ten major mixed doubles titles to her name.
data.text:
Navratilova is widely regarded as one of the greatest female tennis players of all time. Martina Navratilova is worth $25 million. She has 18 Grand Slam singles titles, 31 major womenâs doubles trophies, and ten major mixed doubles titles to her name.

Who is Martina Navratilova?

Navratilova was born in Prague, Czechoslovakia, on October 18, 1956. Her parents split when she was three, and her mother, a talented tennis player, and all-around athlete, relocated the family to Revnice. Martinaâs mother remarried Miroslav Navratil in 1962, and she adopted his surname. He was also her first tennis coach. She began playing tennis consistently at the age of seven, and by the age of 15, she had won the Czechoslovakia national tennis tournament. She made her debut in the United States Law Tennis Association the next year when she was 16, but she did not yet become a professional.

How much does Martina Navratilova make annually?

Martina earned about $20 million in tournament prizes alone during her career. After inflation, that equates to about $33 million in todayâs money. She also made tens of millions of dollars from endorsements.

How many businesses does Martina Navratilova own?

In 1974, Navratilova won her first professional singles title in Orlando, Florida. The following year, she finished second in both the Australian and French Opens. In 1975, she decided to flee Communist Czechoslovakia and acquired her green card from the United States. She later became a citizen of the United States in 1981.

How many Endorsement deals has Martina Navratilova?

Martina will join the LifeApps Brands board of directors. Tennis Legend Appointed to LifeApps Board Martina Navratilova will join the board of directors.

How many Investments does Martina Navratilova have?

Navratilovaâs financial success stemmed from her commercial interests and investments as well. She established her own sports and fitness company, focusing on the production of fitness DVDs and other products. She has also made real estate investments in the United States and the Czech Republic.

How many charities has Martina Navratilova donated to?

Martina has supported the following charities below:

American Association of Retired Persons

Chris Evert Charities

Elton John AIDS Foundation

Human Rights Campaign

Laureus Sport for Good Foundation

NYCLASS

PETA

Save the Rhino

How many Philanthropy works has Martina Navratilova supported?

She volunteers for several charities, including those that support animal rights, poor children, and homosexual rights. She has made public service announcements for PETA. She received the Human Rights Campaignâs National Equality Award in 2000.
